root.name: Reckless Racing Ultimate
root.description: OverviewReckless Racing Ultimate is a top down racing game developed by Pixelbite Games and published by Microsoft Studios for the PC (Windows 8) platform.Reckless Racing Ultimate combines content from both Reckless Racing and Reckless Racing 2 and adds new content.GameplayReckless Racing Ultimate can be played using the keyboard/mouse or by plugging in an Xbox 360 controller.ModesReckless Racing Ultimate contains three different gameplay modes and can be played online.CareerArcadeSingle EventCarsIn Reckless Racing Ultimate there are 24 customizable vehicles to choose from.
